catalog_info.title: Livestock Population Data - West Bengal State
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides district-level livestock population figures for West Bengal, including cattle, buffalo, goat, and sheep. It is valuable for AI modeling related to agricultural planning, livestock disease prediction, and resource allocation within the animal husbandry sector.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.department: Department of Animal and Fisheries Resources

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: West Bengal State, India - specifically districts including Siliguri, Durgapur, Bardhaman, Kolkata, and Howrah.
